mapper.select: select distinct o.ordernum, u.name as uname, u.phone as uphone, s.name as sname, o.ordertype, o.orderdate, o.orderstate, g.totalprice from orders o, users u, store s, (select o.ordernum, sum(o.mtotalprice) as totalprice from orders o group by o.ordernum) g where o.unum = u.num and o.snum = s.num and o.ordernum = g.ordernum
